errors.error_description: The manual installation steps are in the wrong order, instructing the user to restart Home Assistant before copying the integration files, which will prevent the integration from being loaded.
correction_candidates: Restart Home Assistant, copy the files, then restart Home Assistant again.
Copy the files into the `custom_components` folder. A restart is not required.
Place the contents of `custom_components` into the folder, then go to Developer Tools and click 'Reload Custom Components'.

To install, place the contents of `custom_components` into the `<config directory>/custom_components` folder of your Home Assistant installation. Once installed, don't forget to restart your home assistant instance for the integration to be picked up.
errors.golden_answer: To install, place the contents of `custom_components` into the `<config directory>/custom_components` folder of your Home Assistant installation. Once installed, don't forget to restart your home assistant instance for the integration to be picked up.
